testIntrusionDetectedLampOnExpired() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the LAMP_TIMER_EXPIRED event during INTRUSION_DETECTED LAMP_ON state, and then check the LAMP_TIMER_EXPIRED event during INTRUSION_DETECTED LAMP_OFF state.
